trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around September 27th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was attending the Phillies Game with my wife that would ultimately clinch the national league for them. It was about 5 pm in about the 2nd inning I think. The sun was setting on the western part of the stadium and I could see a flock of birds. As they passed over the outfield I could see beyond them that there was a weird "Blurry" point in the sky. When I focused on the blurry point I noticed it was a distinct "V" formation of black dots and must be very high up in the sky to be that blurry. I couldn't believe what I was seeing so I asked my wife and the girl I was sitting next too if theys saw it too. My wife being such a Phillies fan said "shut up and watch the game!" Anyway the girl next to us said she could make out a weird "V" high in the sky that was black. If anyone else saw this at the game it would validate what I have written here tonight. It was very strange and to describe it again: During 5pm sun setting Large Black Dots in a "V" formation very High up moving slowly. If you had similar experience write back on "Phillies UFO" so I know you saw it.
Summary: "Phillies Game" Black Boomerang UFO with 3 or 5 black points
